name: AR Domino
description:
Do you like dominoes? Do you like to put pieces in a set of lines to make them fall? Do you love to see Youtube videos regarding dominoes?

Now you can play dominoes with your phone, and do sets of lines as long as you want.

How to play

You need the Android APP and a set of cards. You can use either the virtual set, to be used in another phone, TV, or tablet... or you can use the printable set to print them.

You need to scan the card, and when it is scanned, click on it to go to edit mode (and to scan a card again click the card button again). With one finger you can move through the virtual grid and with two fingers you can rotate and zoom your visualization.

Rotate your set, put it wherever you want, and add copies of it as you wish. Finally, when you have ended. Click on play

There are some important sets of cards with some special features, but it is explained in the game.

Why?

This game is partly a failed experiment, the original was to put a set of pieces in the real world, through AR cards, to play domino. Unfortunately, the idea didn't work for current AR limitations (position reset by itself, breaking everything) so I had to reformulate this game.

Anyway, I worked hard on it so I made some changes to the original idea to let it work. Because, why not? It is a domino. I can look at falling domino pieces for hours and hours on youtube. So it is fun
